name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing robust backend solutions utilizing **Python**, **Django**, and **Django Rest Framework**. Proficient in building and optimizing **RESTful APIs**, leveraging **Kafka**, **Celery**, and **gRPC** for efficient data processing and communication. Adept in using **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and data analysis tools like **StarRocks**, **ClickHouse**, and **Redshift** to enhance data storage and retrieval performance.

Expert in cloud technologies, especially **AWS**, along with container orchestration using **Kubernetes**. I have a strong foundation in CI/CD practices, ensuring seamless integration and delivery of code, and have implemented monitoring solutions with **Datadog**, **Prometheus**, and **Sentry** for maintaining application health.

Additionally, I bring a wealth of experience in developing enterprise-grade applications within compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, and I am committed to creating secure and scalable software solutions. My background in full-stack development enhances my understanding of holistic system architecture, enabling me to build high-performance and maintainable applications.
